section.title: Introduction
section.para: These release notes are for the incremental release 4.0.8. It includes a summary of changes since 4.0.7, bug fixes since 4.0.7 and any known problems that still exist at the time of the 4.0.8 release. This page is in addition to the top-level 4.0.8 release notes at http://www.globus.org/toolkit/releasenotes/4.0.8.
GridWay was introduced in the previous release, 4.0.7. For those release notes (including feature summary, technology dependencies, etc) go to the GridWay 4.0.7 Release Notes.

section.title: For More Information
section.para: Click here for more information about this component.
